programme.title: Dear Mom (M) Ep56
programme.desc: Feng-Yi Li handles everything in the house while her husband, Shu-An, lounges and daydreams. She constantly worries about the love lives of their four daughters. Yi-Wan starts a relationship with a gang leaders son despite claiming to have never dated. Qing-Qing may be having an affair with a married man. Xiao-Xi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of "the others." An-Qing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When Feng-Yi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize they've neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

programme.title: Gung Hay Fat Choy (M) Ep52
programme.desc: In a bad economy, many people dream of becoming rich overnight, especially the Jiang family. programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep766
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom. <>

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3472
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep87
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2002
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness (T) Ep15
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5077
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: The Brotherhood of Rebel
programme.desc: Chai, a triad member, helps his childhood friend Meow flee Hong Kong after discovering that Meow attempted to kill his triad boss. 17 years later, Chai becomes a key member of the triad. When he runs into Meow one day, he knows that his gang will kill Meow if they find him. Caught between triad and brotherhood, what will Chai choose?

programme.title: A Legend
programme.desc: Archaeologist Professor Fang uncovers artifacts from a glacier expedition that resembles a jade pendant in his dream. To unveil the truth, Professor Fang leads his team to a journey into the glacier, embarking on a fantastical adventure together.

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the midnight gymnasium programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the polices only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Fly Me to the Moon
programme.desc: New Hong Kong immigrants Yuan and her sister face identity crises, poverty, and their father's drug addiction. Initially, the sisters attempt to appease him, but as they enter adolescence, they ultimately rebel and escape. Even as they separate from their father, Yuan finds his traits mirrored in her loved ones.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Ip Man 3
programme.desc: When some gangsters led by a ruthless American property developer force a school to sell their land, Ip Man fights to protect it. Subsequently, Ip Man is challenged by another Wing Chun master Zhang Tian Zhi for the Grandmaster title. Ip Man accepts the challenge for the sake of his family and disciples, and wins the duel for the title.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over the death of her young son by becoming a foster parent. For 13 years, Meis dedication to the foster child leads her to neglect her husband and the true needs of the child. It is only through the childs unintentional help that the couple finally manages to salvage their relationship.

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: Ping reports a case of a rich mans son bribing prison guards to cover up his criminal activities in the prison to the ICAC. ICAC Chief Officer Luk goes undercover in prison to conduct his investigation. Despite the risks involved, Luk is determined to complete his mission with the help of his cell mate, Wang.

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when Des eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Mobster Sing aspires to join the Axe Gang. As he stumbles into a slum ruled by eccentric landlords that are kung fu masters in disguise, his actions cause the gang and the landlords to engage in an explosive kung fu battle

programme.title: Limbo
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of brutal murders committed by a serial killer. Veteran detective Zhan and rookie cop Will are assigned to the case. During the investigation, they encounter Wang Tao, who accidentally killed Zhan's wife. Seeking redemption, Wang assists them in tracking down the killer, but her involvement puts her in grave danger.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, Tiger Wong is ambushed after he unwittingly took the Lousha Plaque but is saved by his brother Dragon Wong. They also befriended Turbo Shek during the fight and the trio forms a brotherhood. To avenge the death of the Dragon Gate masters, they train and vow to defeat Shibumi, the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Player
programme.desc: Chinese Feng Shui master, Carson (Chapman To) was a "Natural Born Player", taking names and breaking hearts. Fate had it that he would meet his match, the hot veterinarian, Chi-Ling (Chrissie Chau). It was love at first sight but neither could stand the other's fickle nature lest the affair might have ended as soon as it began.

programme.title: Better Days
programme.desc: In this Oscar nominee for Best International Feature Film, Nian faces relentless bullying from her peers as she prepares for her college entrance exam. Fate leads her to streetwise punk Bei, but before they can retreat into their own world, both are embroiled in a murder investigation that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963 and ruthlessly built an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Mobster Sing aspires to join the Axe Gang. As he stumbles into a slum ruled by eccentric landlords that are kung fu masters in disguise, his actions cause the gang and the landlords to engage in an explosive kung fu battle

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartels turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brothers hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Rob N Roll
programme.desc: A ruthless bandit, Tian, has plotted an intense and quick armed robbery. When he encounters Hui and Shui who also plan for a robbery, they decide to team up for the heist. However, their ad-hoc and dramatic robbery has started a war with the police hot on pursuit, putting their lives on the line!

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earths surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: Bursting Point
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Bang sends Officer Ming undercover to a drug cartel to displace drug lord Yang. A failed raid triggers Yang's rage for revenge. Meanwhile, drug maker Ying Xiu is forced to cooperate with the police and sets a trap for Yang. The battle between the police and the drug cartel has just begun!

programme.title: Whose Baby Is In The Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls high school, is stuck with a baby that isnt his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: Vengeance Is A Golden Blade
programme.desc: Convoy Master Lis wife has an affair with his rival Long, who plans to steal Lis Golden Blade and kill him as well as his young daughter. Li and his daughter manage to escape and the latter grows up to be a skilled swordswoman who vows to avenge her mothers death a lie told by Li. The truth is revealed when she sees her mother alive by chance.

programme.title: The Mirror And The Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: A young swordman, King Eagle, unwillingly gets involved in the internal affairs of a powerful clan and becomes their target. He is saved by the female chief of the clan, Lin, and falls in love with her. However, Lins sister is part of all evil plots and betrays her. Even so, Lin begs King Eagle not to harm her sister.

programme.title: The Land Of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women only give birth to baby girls and do so by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: Return Of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas pursuit.

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: Duel Of Fist
programme.desc: Fan Ke discovers at his fathers deathbed that he has a half-brother, Wenlie, in Thailand. He goes to find Wenlie, who became a boxer to support his sick mother. Following their encounter, the two got involved in the underworld of boxing match gambling.

programme.title: The Voyage Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: Transformed from a young laboratory researcher, the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan must battle Princess Dragon Mom who wakes up from hibernation to conquer the earth with her army of mutant monsters.

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Lis new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: Gambler'S Delight
programme.desc: The Killer star Danny Lee plays the lead role of a guy who needs to become a hero. He lies, steals and cheats his way into operating a plush casino, but when he incurs the wrath of a female Japanese gang leader, all bets are off!

programme.title: The Imperial Tomb Raiders
programme.desc: The story revolves around a maverick, a band of woman warriors and a group of ruthless bandits. The maverick teams up with the woman warriors to battle the bandits seeking to raid the emperors tomb.

programme.title: Shaolin Mantis
programme.desc: The Emperor orders Feng to find proofs of Master Tians rebellion in his house. Feng falls in love with Tians granddaughter and marries her. When he finds the proofs and tries to leave with her, his wife is killed in the fight against Tian. Feng creates the mantis-style martial arts and vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Return To The 36Th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of scaffolding kung fu.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Secret Service Of The Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the governments secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperors ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jins daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Swift Sword
programme.desc: A righteous swordsman, Bai Yi Pang, seeks revenge on an evil clan but is crippled after being beaten up by them. Years later, a young man encounters Bai who is hiding in a cave. Bai decides to teach this determined young man his Swift Sword skills so that he can help Bai take revenge on the evil clan.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lungs house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lungs mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: This is a martial arts epic directed by Chang Cheh. In the Sung Dynasty, the government is run by corrupt officials, so Sung Jiang gathers 108 outlaws at Mount Liang and establishes a band of patriotic heroes to end the repression of brutal overlords.

programme.title: My Name Ain'T Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandits camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leaders wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: Heroes Of The East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yens property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husbands playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Heaven Sword And Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: Only by bringing together the powerful Heaven Sword and the mighty Dragon Sabre can six martial arts sects struggling for supremacy be saved in this thrilling sequel to Chu Yuan's original hit.

programme.title: Return Of The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: The Kung-Fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wongs caught in the Mongs territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Pings limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: Ma Teng is an assassin of the Flying Guillotine Squad, a group of killers commissioned by the Emperor Yung. When Ma starts to question the morality of his missions, he finds himself becoming a fugitive hunted by his former comrades.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep31
programme.desc: A prince and a commoner who are best friends keep having to thwart the plots of the prince's scheming, ambitious minister.

programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.desc: HaGoLa' is the story of three naughty little friends - Lattha, Hathgola and Goli, who live in a unique world of objects.

programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior.

programme.desc: Steve takes us into the dangerous world of crocodiles - one of nature's most fearsome predators - entering croc-infested territory escorted by an armed safari guide.

programme.title: Michael Portillo's Long Weekends Ep3
programme.desc: Madrid, Part 3 - Michael ends his long weekend on a high as he dines at the oldest restaurant in the world, reputedly, and makes a poignant pilgrimage to his uncle's old flat he first visited 60 years ago.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls Ep8
programme.desc: Derek Hough - Dancer and choreographer Derek Hough joins Bear on a whirlwind adventure across the mountains of Bulgaria.

programme.title: Spy in the Ocean Ep1
programme.desc: Deep Thinkers - Spy Sperm Whale has close encounters with the largest brains on the planet, while Spy Octopus takes us inside the mind of the world's smartest octopus.

programme.title: Simon Reeve's South America Ep1
programme.desc: Simon Reeve travels through the remote and little-visited north east of South America, from Venezuela to French Guiana.

programme.title: Life Below Zero Ep13
programme.desc: Into the Tundra - The everyday struggles of living in the secluded state of Alaska where one wrong decision could cost you your life.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth S1 Ep6
programme.desc: November-December - Full Circle - Witness some of the most incredible natural events in November, from the millions of Monarch butterflies that converge in Mexicos forests to the deep fog that shrouds the city of Dubai, signalling the start of winter.

programme.title: Arabian Seas S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Carnivores of the Coral Garden - The seas are alive with carnivores. Meet the sharks and rays who patrol the coral reefs, hunting down their prey. Learn about toxic fish who disguise themselves to ambush the unwary, and armoured predators who devour vulnerable targets.

programme.title: Arabian Seas S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Magicians of the Reef - Arabias coral reefs are home to some of natures most impressive illusionists. Creatures can pulsate with colour, transform in the blink of an eye, or perform riveting displays of showmanship. Because in these dangerous waters, disguise is crucial.

programme.title: Arabian Seas S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Island Feast - Off the coast of Oman, summer weather drives nutrients in from the ocean depths where they meet the Arabian sun, causing an explosion of life. Smaller fish spawn, filling the waters with eggs. This creates a buffet predators just cant resist.

programme.title: Arabian Seas S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Defenders of the Reef - Its summer in the Gulf of Oman. The scorching Arabian sun heats the shallow waters to 86 degrees boosting the growth of algae across a vast coral reef. This attracts thousands of hungry herbivores creating a fish versus fish turf war.

programme.title: Arabian Seas S1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Turtle's Legacy - The sea turtle is one of the oldest animals on earth. These ancient mariners even pre-date the dinosaurs. They have existed, relatively unchanged, for over 100 million years. But now, all seven of the surviving species are endangered.

programme.title: In for the Kill
programme.desc: Marvel at the clever ways predators use cunning, agility, and breakneck speed when taking down prey. Witness luring behaviours and see how some killers hide in plain sight, while others put weaponry or chemical warfare to work to bring dinner home.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Kimba's Rise - While the dominant males roam nearby territories, hunting duties fall to the Mwamba prides nine strong lionesses. See how they cope with the approach of the rainy season and six growing teenagers with boundless appetites.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Prides and Prejudice - As the lionesses set out to recover the males who are needed to hunt buffalo, they must cross a crocodile-infested river. Follow Milo, the only cub in the mighty Mwamba pride, as hes saved from snapping jaws and cements the familys future.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: The Misfit Comes of Age - If the tiny Nsefu pride is to survive, the teen Misfit and his older brother must quickly perfect their hunting skills. Trek into enemy territory as the lions face dominant rivals and a powerful hyena clan in the search for prey.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The Leopard Who Changed Her Spots - Meet pampered young leopardess Chipadzua, who has never had to hunt for food, thanks to her patient mother. Alone for the first time in her life, will she develop the skills it takes to survive?

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Deadly Rivals - Enter the world of a wild dog pack whose bountiful hunting grounds are threatened when a clan of spotted hyenas moves in nearby. The vulnerable pups start to go hungry as the scavenging rivals steal their food and eventually raid their den.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Buffalo Showdown - To the lion, the buffalo is not only a satisfying dinner but also dangerous. Track a herd of 300 buffalo along with the Mwamba pride, who must act quickly and carefully if they are to take down their prey.

programme.title: In for the Kill
programme.desc: Marvel at the clever ways predators use cunning, agility, and breakneck speed when taking down prey. Witness luring behaviours and see how some killers hide in plain sight, while others put weaponry or chemical warfare to work to bring dinner home.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: The Misfit Comes of Age - If the tiny Nsefu pride is to survive, the teen Misfit and his older brother must quickly perfect their hunting skills. Trek into enemy territory as the lions face dominant rivals and a powerful hyena clan in the search for prey.

programme.desc: The Leopard Who Changed Her Spots - Meet pampered young leopardess Chipadzua, who has never had to hunt for food, thanks to her patient mother. Alone for the first time in her life, will she develop the skills it takes to survive?

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Deadly Rivals - Enter the world of a wild dog pack whose bountiful hunting grounds are threatened when a clan of spotted hyenas moves in nearby. The vulnerable pups start to go hungry as the scavenging rivals steal their food and eventually raid their den.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Buffalo Showdown - To the lion, the buffalo is not only a satisfying dinner but also dangerous. Track a herd of 300 buffalo along with the Mwamba pride, who must act quickly and carefully if they are to take down their prey.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride S2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Missing Manzi - Join Julz and park scout Simon Chulu as they track the Kakuli pack, who they filmed last year, and a Manzi faction whove ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group. Spot the Kakumbi making a kill before a happy Manzi reunion ensues.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Kogelberg - Considered to be the most beautiful of the Capes protected areas, Kogelberg Nature Reserve has experienced minimal human interference. Discover the spectacular land and sea life flourishing in this unique botanical wonderland.

programme.title: Loons: A Cry from the Mist
programme.desc: Race the clock with biologists as they try to figure out why North American loons are suddenly in danger. Unlock the mysterious lives of these beloved birds, and ponder whether their cries will continue to be summers soundtrack or go silent forever.

programme.title: Ocean Parks S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Bonaire National Marine Park - Deep in the South Caribbean Sea, explore the protected waters of Bonaire National Marine Park, home to thriving reefs, endangered sea turtles, sprawling mangroves, and a plethora of marine life.

programme.title: Ocean Parks S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Florida Keys National Marine Sanctuary - This episode examines the importance of three marine habitat types in the Florida Keys including the animals within them and conservationists efforts to protect them.

programme.title: Ocean Parks S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Monterey Bay Marine Sanctuary - On the West Coast of the United States, the Monterey Bay National Marine Sanctuary is the largest marine sanctuary in the country - home to 525 species of fish, and a massive, underwater Kelp forest.

programme.title: Ocean Parks S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Mesoamerican Reef - The Mesoamerican Reef is a pristine ocean ecosystem- but after decades of overfishing and tourist activity, much of this reef is in jeopardy. These Parks are monitored by Ocean advocates dedicated to maintaining the shark feeding grounds, turtle populations and marine spawning grounds that line this incredible reef system.

programme.title: Ocean Parks S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Bahamas Exuma Cays - The Exuma Cays are a remote wonder: hundreds of tiny islands extending south from the Bahamian Capital of Nassau. In the 1950s, developers dreamed of developing this pristine, and largely unexplored region. But before construction could begin, the Bahamian government supported an expedition to chart the cays. They liked what they saw, and in 1959 established the Bahamas National Trust, creating the Bahamas first Ocean Park.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Elephant Story - Once superabundant, African Elephant populations have declined drastically due to hunting. Get an in-depth look into the lives of the most powerful land mammals on the planet, and see what parks like Addo and Tembe are doing to preserve their future.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Killer Packs - Surviving the African savanna requires guile and teamwork for species who live in packs. Follow a day in the life of African wild dogs and dwarf mongooses to see how they rely on their tight-knit families to overcome the challenging landscape.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Living Together - A complex web of relationships rules all life on earth: all species are interconnected, none can survive in isolation. While some relationships are one-sided, others are mutually beneficial. From loose associations to tight-knit partnerships, everything has a place in natures great scheme. Complex interactions between species are not even limited to animals, and some of the best examples occur in the lush mountain forests of Africa.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Crocs and Hippos of Ndumo - The Nile crocodile and hippopotamus are two of Africas amphibious freshwater icons, found in waterways, rivers and lakes across the continent, including the stunning wilderness of Kwa-Zulu Natal in South Africa. These two species have co-existed for thousands of years, evolving in different ways to a life aquatic.

programme.title: Rewilding S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Return of the European Bison - Travel to western Germany, where Europes largest mammals have returned to the landscape after being hunted to extinction in the early 20th century. Discover the challenges animals and humans face from the beasts reintroduction to the wild.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Littlest Cub - Get to know Winston, a tiny abandoned cub who imprints on Judy as she nurses him 24-7. Feel the heartbreak as she severs their emotional attachment and teaches this sweet little fellow how to be a grown-up, independent bear in the non-human world.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Meet the X-Girls - Welcome sisters Xiba, Xyla, and Xola, a trio of starving orphans who turn Winstons world upside down before gentle Xola teaches him a lesson about friendship. Then monitor new cubs Yasmine and Yara, who get reacquainted after a stressful separation.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Becoming a Bear - Bone up on outdoor skills as Winston and the X girls move into their new fresh-air enclosure, and witness Yasmine and Yaras kindergarten power struggle. Then look over restless yearling Victor, whose sudden limp pushes back his release date.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Victor Goes Wild - Experience the joys of rain and climbing with Yasmine and Yara, and watch Winston take a dip in his new pool. Go hunting for dropped radio collars with Roger and Steve, then see what happens when the two groups of summer cubs come face-to-face.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome to the Tundra - Wake up post-hibernation with 7 ravenous bears as Stage 1 of the competition kicks off. Battle wolves with new mom BoldFace, see tiny Stomper vie for power and Blondies love, and stand back as grizzled vet Bernie brawls with clueless teen Casanova.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Slammin' Salmon - Join the frantic dash to cash in on Julys salmon run with the Stage 1 winners and some tough new recruits. Tag along on BigBoi's food-finding road trip, welcome QuadMom and RedBack to the feast, and see if BoldFace can keep her surviving cub safe.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge S1 Ep3
programme.desc: So Long and Thanks for All the Fish - Bundle up as an icy October storm complicates the race to the finish line. See Big Boi bounce after a stumble before tragedy hits QuadMom, and cheer as fan fave BoldFace hits her stride despite her clingy kid, Raccoon. But who will wear the crown?

programme.desc: The Littlest Cub - Get to know Winston, a tiny abandoned cub who imprints on Judy as she nurses him 24-7. Feel the heartbreak as she severs their emotional attachment and teaches this sweet little fellow how to be a grown-up, independent bear in the non-human world.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Kakumbi Are Vulnerable - Encounter an elephant as Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups, who face off with a stubborn, razor-tusked warthog. Follow Thandie Mweetwa, ZCPs lion specialist, who counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Praying for Rain - Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Inside Story - Look behind the scenes and meet the innovative teams working to preserve and protect Kenyas wildlife. Check out Save the Elephants radio-tracking-collar system, a drone that monitors wild dog packs, and a local team of Maasai cheetah trackers.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Prides and Prejudice - As the lionesses set out to recover the males who are needed to hunt buffalo, they must cross a crocodile-infested river. Follow Milo, the only cub in the mighty Mwamba pride, as hes saved from snapping jaws and cements the familys future.

programme.title: Boss Shark
programme.desc: Witness the ultimate battle for dominance as scientists try to pick out the alpha male in a pack of 100-plus great white sharks off the New Zealand coast. Marvel at the speed, hunting prowess, and fearlessness that determine the leader of the pack.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: Wade into a saltwater marsh along the Connecticut River to witness the heartwarming reunion of two ospreys whove been mates for a decade. Witness their highs and lows over a single summer as they raise their chicks and dodge a host of predators.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Dragon Mountain: Surviving the Summit - South Africa's Drakensberg is one of the continent's most impressive landscapes. It is home to sharp climatic and ecological gradients as physical conditions change for both land-based creatures and the Raptors that swirl in the skies above.

programme.title: Rewilding S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hidden Gem of the North - Explore a biodiversity hotspot in the heart of northern Germany, where biologists engineered the return of tree frogs, mink, Ferruginous ducks, and osprey. Discover how the area may become a paradise for many rare animals once considered extinct.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Praying for Rain - Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.desc: Dragon Mountain: Surviving the Summit - South Africa's Drakensberg is one of the continent's most impressive landscapes. It is home to sharp climatic and ecological gradients as physical conditions change for both land-based creatures and the Raptors that swirl in the skies above.

programme.title: Rewilding S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hidden Gem of the North - Explore a biodiversity hotspot in the heart of northern Germany, where biologists engineered the return of tree frogs, mink, Ferruginous ducks, and osprey. Discover how the area may become a paradise for many rare animals once considered extinct.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Praying for Rain - Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Inside Story - Look behind the scenes and meet the innovative teams working to preserve and protect Kenyas wildlife. Check out Save the Elephants radio-tracking-collar system, a drone that monitors wild dog packs, and a local team of Maasai cheetah trackers.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Prides and Prejudice - As the lionesses set out to recover the males who are needed to hunt buffalo, they must cross a crocodile-infested river. Follow Milo, the only cub in the mighty Mwamba pride, as hes saved from snapping jaws and cements the familys future.

programme.title: Boss Shark
programme.desc: Witness the ultimate battle for dominance as scientists try to pick out the alpha male in a pack of 100-plus great white sharks off the New Zealand coast. Marvel at the speed, hunting prowess, and fearlessness that determine the leader of the pack.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: Wade into a saltwater marsh along the Connecticut River to witness the heartwarming reunion of two ospreys whove been mates for a decade. Witness their highs and lows over a single summer as they raise their chicks and dodge a host of predators.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Something for Everyone - Rachel goes on a historical and spiritual journey to discover chocolate's universal appeal. Her enticing recipes include chewy, crunchy chocolate cookies.

programme.title: Nadiya's Family Favourites S1 Ep5
programme.desc: People to Stay - Nadiya creates dishes perfect for when people come to stay, learns all about chillies from self-confessed chilli geek George, and meets coffee experts Dale and Dhan.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Anthony and Bianca's Shed to Shepherd's Hut - Simon travels to Wiltshire to meet Anthony and Bianca who have grand plans to turn the shed at the bottom of their garden into a unique B&B. But those hopes are dashed when expert, Simon Parfett, says it's just too old and rickety to renovate.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Cooking for Less S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Series 1, Episode 2 - Jamie demonstrates how to stretch a tub of mince by making two dishes from it: meatball kebabs and crispy pork and homemade noodles. For a veggie option, Jamie makes an economy saving 'Veggie Puff Roll', and Karan Gokani demonstrates how to make a Cauliflower Curry using an airfyer.

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Vegetables - Jason shares his love of fresh produce with a trip to a supersized Dubai vegetable market as he makes dishes that include a tomato tartare with black olive tapenade and a pudding made with beetroot and carrot. He is joined by Chef Mohamed Orfali, who visits a farm just outside Dubai that grows vegetables in desert sand.

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fish - Award winning chef Jason Atherton continues his journey through Dubai at the beach, where he cooks up some delicious fish and seafood recipes inspired by this beautiful coastal city. He is joined by Chef Akmal Anuar, who heads into the Persian Gulf on a deep-sea fishing trip to catch fresh barracuda for his incredible woodfired recipe.

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Fruit - Michelin starred chef Jason uses beautiful produce from the Middle East to create delicious dishes that have fruit as the hero ingredientfigs, balsamic, and honey, and a salad of orange, carrot, and avocado, with a zesty orange and lime dressing. Jason's guest chef is his own Executive chef in Dubai, who samples some fruity cocktails before creating a delicious lobster and mango dish.

programme.title: Donal's Feasts: Fasts and Festivals S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Episode One sees Donal visit Hare Krishna Island in Lough Erne for a festival, where food offerings to the deities are central to the celebrations.

programme.desc: Tea and Coffee - Jason makes a splash with delicious recipes flavoured with tea and coffee, as well as getting a lesson in the do's and don'ts of serving a traditional Emirati cup of coffee. Chef Nick Alvis will be making a delicious sea bass and celeriac dish with a hibiscus infused cream sauce.

programme.desc: Bakery - Jason is proving that bread and pastries are a serious business in Dubai with some delicious cheese pastry parcels to start and a crumbly semolina and almond cake.

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Dubai Innovations - Jason cooks up some classic British and French dishes from his first time in Dubai over 20 years ago. He'll be celebrating his dear friend Gary Rhodes who was THE Dubai innovator. He'll cook up some classic Rhodes dishes, including smoked haddock Welsh rarebit and bread and butter pudding.

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes S1 Ep10

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep46
programme.desc: Voice Fail Part 1 & 2 - When Grug wakes up without a voice, he and Ugga go on the hunt to find his voice, while Eep, Thunk, and Gran stay behind. But when the Valleyites come to Eep with questions for Grug, she takes this opportunity to be a leader by pretending to have a conversation with Grug in their cave

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep47
programme.desc: Punch Thunk Love / Nay Boors - When Eep and the others try to intervene with Thunk and Blurg's first date, they decide to run away so they can live happily ever after; Snoot and Ugga race each other to get to the Doomsday Skunkguin but are forced to put their differences aside once the weirder animals come out to hunt them down

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep9
programme.desc: Big Poppy / Neighbor War - When a troll starts to ruin the fun of open mic night Poppy is forced to enter a compliment battle.Branch tries to drive Sky Toronto away when he moves next door.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep10
programme.desc: Remote Out of Control / Critter Comfort - Biggie takes Branchs superpowered remote but must return it before Branch finds outWhen Poppy builds a new home for a group of cute critters she accidentally attracts their predators.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep9
programme.desc: The Really Really Big Lie - When Julien concocts an elaborate lie, blaming a giant "mega-gecko" for ruining a young lemur's birthday party.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep10
programme.desc: One More Cup - Julien finds a bag of coffee beans in the Cove of Wonders and gets the entire lemur community hooked on caffeine.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep2
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Dreadful Debacle of DJ Drowsy Drawers - George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Horrible Hostilities of the Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep5
programme.desc: Adventure - Puss misses the old days adventuring with his buddy Jack Sprat. Fearful he will leave San Lorenzo, Dulcinea concocts a super special adventure surprise with the orphans. But Jack Sprat shows up with the promise of a damsel in distress who turns out to be a super scary monster.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep5
programme.desc: Spinny Water / Kelp's Song - Kelp and his underwater friends race around an obstacle course, but Cruz gets sucked into a whirlpool. As each of them try to rescue him, they are sucked in! Kelp saves them all using his unicorn spark to create bubbles he attaches to seaweed. / Kelp helps his unicorn friends create music with their horns and pieces of nature. Ollie is embarrassed by the sound of his horn.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep5
programme.desc: Tree Troubles / Missing Pieces - When Marcus brings home the class tree sapling for the weekend, the Dew Drops see it starting to wilt and must cheer the sapling up, so Marcus can make sure to plant it for his class. / When Athena accidentally breaks Lola's nature sculpture, the Dew Drops must go on a scavenger hunt to replace the missing pieces.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep5
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep3
programme.desc: Old Dog, New Tricks \ Snoozie-Hullabaloozie - Tag chooses to pair up with her Grandpaw for the Barker Family Talent Show, and together, they search for their winning talent. \ Tag is surprised to learn that today is the Pawston Snoozie-a-Hullabaloozie. With everything shut down for the day, Tag and Scooch take the opportunity to play all over town, while trying not to wake up other dogs.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep3
programme.desc: Sewer Koi and the Museum Heist - An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced theyre the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but hes missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewers water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! Its going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before its too late.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep4
programme.desc: Peng vs. Peng - With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNais stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that hes possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Pengs body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep19
programme.desc: We Are Family (Part 1) - Hiccup and Toothless search for other Night Furies.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep20
programme.desc: We Are Family (Part 2) - Hiccup and Toothless are kidnapped and must escape Outcast Island.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep1
programme.desc: How to Start a Dragon Academy - Hiccup is given the responsibility to integrate dragons into the village of Berk and must contend with his rowdy friends, unruly dragons and an upset village elder.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep73
programme.desc: Breaking The Bank - Crispin Biscuits heists the underwater Baby Bank in an attempt to steal all the funds from Boss and Tinas new company. Boss, Tina and Banker Baby Benny must infiltrate the bank via submarine to stop this high-stakes aquatic robbery. But Boss and Tina struggle to stay on the same page after Tina admits that she might, kinda, sorta be thinking about retiring as a regular baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep74
programme.desc: Hate That Baby! - After Crispin Biscuits changes the Baby Love economy to reward companies for bringing in baby hate, Boss Baby is forced to make himself the most hated baby in town to save their startup company. Meanwhile, Tina needs to end Crispin Biscuits attacks on their company before she can finally hang up her boss role and retire to a life of cuddle time with daddy and mommy.

programme.desc: Yeti Superstitious - Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his big bad year on the zodiac calendar which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNais superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he breaks up with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep7

programme.desc: Hidden - Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.desc: Lucky And The Unbreakable Spirit - A wild horse Spirit and a soontobe city girl Lucky become friends in a frontier town

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep7

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep38
programme.desc: Yellow 100 - Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Mortys five babies.

programme.desc: A Cabbage Kinda Day - Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Mortys babies still in her building. Shes going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Parking Garage / The Crew Builds A Campsite - The Crew helps with a parking problem when Caf Carl's ice cream machine brings lots of cars to Builder Cove.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Tres Leches Trouble / Wizzle Wozzle Woo - Dora, Boots, and Benny have to trek through the rainforest to deliver a big, delicate tres leches cake to Benny's abuela.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Fishers Go Fishing - On a fishing trip Sharkdog meets a Great White Shark and Max fears he'll lose his best friend to his wild instincts.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Hide-and-Go-Shark - Max and his friends visit Dad at the aquarium, but can they keep Dad from discovering Sharkdog?

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Green Around the Gills - Max is ready to go on his fun camping trip when Sharkdog comes down with a mysterious illness.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep521
programme.desc: The Pet Competition - Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep523
programme.desc: The Noisy Night - Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep524
programme.desc: The Wishing Well - Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party - The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Apple Pie / Guacamole - Tiny Chef bakes apple pie for the big contest, and after an accident, has to think fast to come up with a new entry.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Paper Landscapes / Cowgirl - Barbamama and Barbapapa are surprised to see more and more billboards on the road. // Barbalala dreams of becoming a cowgirl and Barbidou is determined to help her.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Innovation Melting Pot / Make Up Your Mind Barbazoo - The Barbababies want to invent like Leonardo da Vinci. // The Barbababies must choose between going to the pool or going for a bike ride.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Paddington's Race Against the Storm / Paddington's Super Snail - Judy finds her inner hero when a storm hits on a Rangers Camping trip, and they need to shelter from the weather.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep402
programme.desc: The Pickle Family Campout - When all the members of Pickle's family get lost in the woods, Pickle teams up with Tow Truck Blaze to come to their rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pups Save the Soccer Game / Pups Save a Lucky Collar - Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team to a soccer match, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol are called in to play.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Mini-Patrol / Pups Save a Lost Tooth - Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol, recruitng Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep224
programme.desc: FLOWMO / Fishy Scouts - When all the other fishies are out of town during winter vacation, Baby and William create their very own fin-credible day of friendship.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Vandal! / Tumbles, Where Did You Go? - Barbidur catches a mysterious masked vandal. // Tototutu, Barbidur's favorite little car, has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Paddington's Puffling Rescue / Paddington Goes Under The Sea - Paddington and the Browns rescue pufflings who, instead of taking their firs flight, get lost around the campsite. Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonatahn and Judy - but where is Judy's necklace

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep216
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bowling Alley / The Crew Builds A Superbloom Path - Rubble & the pups find Grandpa Gravel's lucky bowling ball. Too bad Builder Cove doesn't have a bowling alley... until now!

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Catch The Quickatoo / Lost Lorito - Abuela shows Dora her photo album of birds, with one page blank: the Quickatoo. Dora vows to find the Quickatoo and get a picture to complete the album.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Ninja Blaze - Ninja Master Blackbelt is training Blaze and AJ to be powerful ninjas when Crusher and Pickle accidentally launch themselves onto an icy mountain!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Donuts / Rainbow Salad - Chef attempts to bake Olly's favorite donuts for her surprise birthday breakfast without waking her up.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Great Shark Hunter - Max needs to find more and more fishsticks to keep Sharkdog fed, but his search leads him right into the path of the increasingly suspicious Captain Barb Quigley.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Sharks, Sharks, Sharks - Max and Dad are excited to continue their tradition of watching a sharks TV special together, but this year Sharkdog wants to be included.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Sharkdog Home Alone - When the Fishers go to the movies, Sharkdog is left home alone for the first time.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Ice Ice Vola / Do or Diary - Vola trains to become an amazing hockey player in just one day. // Chucks tries to learn everything he can about teen fishies to get closer to his stepsister, Maddie.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep225
programme.desc: Finloose - When dancing is outlawed in Carnivore Cove, Baby Shark will do whatever it takes to get the town dancing again!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Lost Keys - After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a very deep drain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep519
programme.desc: George's New Dinosaur - When his favorite toy dinosaur loses its tail, George visits Mr Fox's Shop to find a new one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep520
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Train to the Rescue - Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep152
programme.desc: The Robot Player - Christopher has organized several games in the CLEARING for his friends to play. And the prize for each will be a TROPHY!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep153
programme.desc: Smile Day - When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Freeze Pops / Lemonade - Tiny Chef makes ice pops but can't wait for them to freeze! He learns that patience is an important part of cooking.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Dino Cake - Olly wants to make a simple cake for her Dinosaur Club, but Chef insists on complicating the recipe.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S08 Ep806
programme.desc: Tire Trouble - Blaze and his pals are gearing up for a big race with brand new tires! But when Crusher tricks Starla, Darington and Stripes into putting on out-of-control SILLY tires, it's up to Blaze to rescue them.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep111
programme.desc: CAKE-tastrophe! - When a hungry Crusher accidentally turns the baker trucks baker bots to messy mode, they sprout wheels and drive away!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep705
programme.desc: Pups Save a Waiter-Bot / Pups Stop a Pie-Clone - Mr. Porter's high tech waiter robot helps around the caf, but it can't stop cleaning! It's up to the Pups to clean up the mess all over town!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep710
programme.desc: Pups Save the Big Bad Bird Crew / Pups Save a Soapbox Derby - Myrna the Mynah bird leads her feathered friends astray and it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue the wayward flock.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Pups Save a Film Festival - The pups are shooting their Film Festival entry until Daring Danny X cuts the action with his dangerous stunt.
